name: Ascent to Valhalla
description:
The Observer God, Heimdall, has mysteriously disappeared, and hundreds of monsters have been appearing in the Nine Worlds since.

Odin has tasked you, his son, to find him between Midgard and Asgard. To complete this mission, you'll have to master the powers of Space and Time you have inherited from your father and fight your way until you find him!

Credits:

  • Jordi Climent Cantó
  • Pau Amigó Arjona
  • Adrià Oliete Kamdem
  • Aniol Morató Gil
